name: xiaomi mi mijia humidifier 4l MJJSQ02LX (non-smart)
description:
Product Features:
• Silver ion purifying mode (Antibacterial material, 99% antibacterial)
• Directly add water from the top of the water tank
• 4L capacity of water tank (~36 hours continuous mist)
• Separation water tank makes cleaning more convenient
• Top of the humidifier is about 14 cm, easy to clean
• 3 mist of adjustment (Low grade mist, Mid-range mist, High-grade mist)
•  Double protection secure system

Product Specifications:
• External Dimension: 184.9 x 312.5mm
• Product weight: 1.4kg
• Rated Power: 17.5W
• Power Voltage: AC 220V
• Power Frequency: 50Hz
• Material: silver ion
• Humidification Volume: 280ml/h
• Sound Power: ≤38dB
• Mist Height: ≥50cm

Package Contents:
• Mijia Humidifier 4L MJJSQ02LX x1
• User manual x1
• UK plugx1
